# cap-heading

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                           | Type                                                                              | Default      |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| `clip`   | `clip`    | If the text should be clipped at the end of the line. | `boolean`                                                                         | `false`      |
| `family` | `family`  | Defines the font family.                              | `"mono" \| "sans" \| "serif"`                                                     | `'sans'`     |
| `level`  | `level`   | Defines the font size.                                | `"primary" \| "quaternary" \| "quinary" \| "secondary" \| "senary" \| "tertiary"` | `'primary'`  |
| `size`   | `size`    | Description...                                        | `"adaptive" \| "large" \| "normal"`                                               | `'adaptive'` |
| `tag`    | `tag`     | The HTML heading tag.                                 | `1 \| 2 \| 3 \| 4 \| 5 \| 6`                                                      | `1`          |
| `weight` | `weight`  | Defines the font weight.                              | `"heavy" \| "light" \| "soft" \| "strong"`                                        | `'heavy'`    |
